javax.servlet.http

接口 HttpUpgradeHandler

  • 所有已知子接口:
    InternalHttpUpgradeHandler
    所有已知实现类:
    Http2AsyncUpgradeHandler, TestUpgrade.EchoBlocking, TestUpgrade.EchoNonBlocking, TestUpgrade.FixedResponseNonBlocking, TestUpgrade.SetNullReadListener, TestUpgrade.SetNullWriteListener, TestUpgrade.SetReadListenerTwice, TestUpgrade.SetWriteListenerTwice, TestUpgradeInternalHandler.EchoAsync, WsHttpUpgradeHandler

    public interface HttpUpgradeHandler
    Interface between the HTTP upgrade process and the new protocol.
    从以下版本开始:
    Servlet 3.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void destroy()
      This method is called after the upgraded connection has been closed.
      void init(WebConnection connection)
      This method is called once the request/response pair where HttpServletRequest.upgrade(Class) is called has completed processing and is the point where control of the connection passes from the container to the HttpUpgradeHandler.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init(WebConnection connection)
        This method is called once the request/response pair where HttpServletRequest.upgrade(Class) is called has completed processing and is the point where control of the connection passes from the container to the HttpUpgradeHandler.
        参数:
        connection - The connection that has been upgraded
        从以下版本开始:
        Servlet 3.1

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        This method is called after the upgraded connection has been closed.
